creator: mconley@mozilla.com
summary: Slave loan request for a talos-linux64-ix machine

comments.text:
We need this to investigate a cpstartup Talos regression (bug 1456728).

Along with my own access, timdream and/or bgrins might also want access.
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com

comments.text: Hello there, I'll be sending you an email with the credentials in a few hours
comments.author: rmutter@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Email sent to Mike, Joe and Tim for further instructions. 

Loaning machines: 
- talos-linux64-ix-064

Hi Mike, Joe and Tim, 

I am going to assign this to you to keep track of the loan. 

When you are finished with the loan forever, please comment stating so here in the bug, and mark the bug as RESOLVED.

Comment again when you want it started back up.
* For faster turnaround, ping #buildduty (look for nick with 'buildduty')
comments.author: rmutter@mozilla.com

comments.text:
I think we ended up finding a solution before I could get this loaner set-up to run the cpstartup test.

I'm going to throw this loaner back into the pool. Thanks!
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com

comments.text: I'm going to loan the second machine for Mike Conley. I'll send you an email with the credentials when I finish the loaning process.
comments.author: riman@mozilla.com

comments.text: Hi riman, sorry if you've already started to go through this, but I've (happily) managed to find a machine in the office here locally where I can reproduce the issue, so I don't require the loaner anymore. Please throw it back into the pool. :)
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com

comments.text: Marking this as FIXED so that the loaner can go back.
comments.author: mconley@mozilla.com

comments.text: Seems like there is nothing to be reimaged. Talked with :riman and we need docs for such loaners.
comments.author: rmutter@mozilla.com

creator_detail.name: mconley@mozilla.com
creator_detail.real_name: Mike Conley (:mconley) (:⚙️) (Catching up on needinfos / reviews)
